General.Name: Circa Group AS
General.Description: Circa Group AS engages in producing bio-based chemicals in Australia, France, the United Kingdom, Belgium, and Norway. The company extracts value from non-food waste biomass to produce bio-based chemicals through its proprietary Furacell process. Its products include Cyrene, a polar aprotic solvent; and Levoglucosenone derivatives. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Oslo, Norway.
